import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import Menu from '../Menu/Menu' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' function Services() { const[url,seturl]=useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`https://www.kavitadentalclinic.com/masterwiz_admin/api/menu-content`) .then(res => { seturl(res.data.data.MenuContent) }).catch(err => console.log(err)) },[]); return (

Digitization Services

  • Home
  • Services

We provide all kinds of "Digitization Services"

These days the internet has emerged as the most effective and convenient way to transfer data,overcoming physical and geographic barriers in the blink of an eye. If your data doesn’t currently exist in the digital realm, it will soon need to.The process is called Document Digitization.
In brief, the digitization of a document is the conversion of a paper document into various digital formats. With the advent of digital technology, it is now possible to convert physical documents like newspapers, periodicals, books, images, texts, and other business paperwork into a digitized version such as pdf, doc, Xls, XML, jpeg, gif, HTML, CD, tape.

Why Digitize?

  • Easy to transport and share
  • Faster access
  • Easy to duplicate
  • Easy to transport and share
  • Compatible with various forms of digitalized data transfer

Document Digitization At Rely Services

  • Requirement analysis - The client’s requirements are discussed and a plan developed.
  • Document Scanning – The documents are scanned and saved in the form of an image file.
  • Document Indexing – The documents are saved with the proper file name for easy identification and retrieval.
  • Conversion to Digital Format – An Optical Character Recognition system of hardware and software is used to convert the image files into text files. Proofreaders manually check the conversion for accuracy.
  • Document Organization – As per the requirements of the customer, the documents are separated or combined into PDF or other digital format files.
) } export default Services
